title: The 1st day of classes is coming and all the students are excited!
content:
The 1st day of classes is coming and all the students are excited! It's actually just an IT briefing but somehow it seems symbolic to everyone. I get my bike back from the shop tomorrow. I think I'll bike over to Waitrose and get some lovely dover sole.

-e.
author: ebensorkin

comments.content:
Have a good year, Eben!

ChrisL
I hope you blog up a storm about your experiences. I second what Chris said!

<cite> ... I hope you blog up a storm about your experiences ... </cite>

Second that.

+++

Have a great year, Eben!
Best of luck, Eben! At least I know that you’ll be posting lots of photos from Reading.
Have a great year. Looking forward to hearing about it.
was it everything you hoped it would be? :D
Sounds awesome. Do post links and flickr photos when you get the chance.
All the best, Eben. Keep us posted.
Have a great year at Reading!

Godspeed, Eben!

I’m trying to keep people updated on my blog and Flickr account but there’s more stuff brewing, from other students too. Reading so far is amazing, it’s so exciting to be here.

Good Luck with it all Eben!

Take Care

Andy
How about a round up of all of this year's students' flickr links, blogs, etc.? We don't want to miss out on anyone :D

Thanks for all the support! I really appreciate it!

I think that there is very limited blogging going on so far. I am have something in process but it will be a little while before I shows up. I will ask the other students to send me their links & create a compendium 'o links. Dan - you set quite a high bar for us to meet!

Despite it's being quite early, I am very happy with the way things are going already.

I still haven't been to Waitrose. It farther off than I thought! Maybe today though...
